topic.title: Atatiana Jefferson was shot and killed by Fort Worth police inside her home this morning.
topic.body:
How the fuck are these police thugs not getting life in prison for their carelessness?!

https://www.dallasnews.com/news/2019/10/12/watch-video-shows-fort-worth-police-officer-fatally-shoot-woman-inside-her-home/

2_1J3rJ8ecnwH2EPYa6MrgZttBNc61ACFiCj.body:
> [happyrabbit](#comment_14_1Hd7H8VUbdieey29AGC2xLxedDiPdM7JTT): idk why havent you impeached him yet if hes so horrible and every thing the tube says about him is true

everyone likes to complain but no one wants to take any action.  pisses me off. so i will go sit in my chair and complain about that.
